rukus.text: Twa-Ha
Nganituntuluchisya mmwe (Muhammadi ﷺ) Qur’an kuti nnagasiche
Nambo kuti jiwe chikumbusyo kwa mundu jwaakun’jogopa (Allah)
Chakutulusyidwa chakuumila kwa Ajula jwawagumbile litaka ni mawunde gagali kwinani nnope
(Jwalakwe ni Allah) Jwaukoto wejinji, jwatenjele pa Arishi (Chindanda Chaulungu katenjele kakulandana ni uchimbichimbi Wakwe)
Iwele Yakwe yosope yaili kumawunde ni yaili petaka ni yaili chilikati chakwe, kwika soni yaili pasi petaka
Sano kanga chinnyanyiche lilowe (pakuomba duwa kapena kutenda mwakusongona; yalumope), ngati chisimu Jwalakwe (Allah) jukumanyilila yaasili ni yakusisika nnope
Allah! Pangali nnungu jwine (jwakuwajilwa kun’galagatila) ikaweje Jwele pejo, Jwalakwe jukwete Mena gambone nnope
Soni ana jinyyiche abali ja Musa

Ndema jajwauweni moto, basi ni jwalisalile liwasa lyakwe kuti: “Jembechelani! Chisimu une nauweni moto; mwine une kuwa nkwika nacho kukwenu chisinga kuumila mu walakweo, kapena chingapate pa motopo jwakunondolela (litala).”
Basi ndema jajwauwichilile (motowo) jwawilanjidwe (kuti): “E mmwe Musa!”
“Chisimu Une ni Nam’mbuje gwenu! Basi wulani ilatu yenu; chisimutu mmwe n’di pachiwata chakutakata (chakuwilanjikwa) Tuwaa.”
“Soni Une nansagwile (kuwa Ntume), basi pikanilani yaikujuwulidwa.”
“Chisimu Une ni Allah! Pangali nnungu jwine (jwakuwajilwa kun’galagatila) ikaweje Unepe, basi mungalagatilani, ni n’jimicheje Swala mwakolosya pakungumbuchila Une.”
“Chisimu Kiyama jikwisa, melepe ngujisisa, kuti mundu jwalijose akalipidwe pa yaakupanganya.”
“Sano akasansiwilikanganya ata panandi kuleka (kulupilila) ya jalakwejo ajula jwangakujikulupilila, ni jugamba kuya isako yakwe; ntakwisa mwan’jonasiche.”
“Ana nichichi chele chachili mu nkono wenu wan’dyo mmwe Musa?”
Jwalakwe jwatite: “Jalakweji nisimbo jangu, ngujijegamilaga jalakweji (pakwenda), ni ngupakatichisyaga masamba gakulichisya ngondolo syangu, nambo soni une ngwete mu jalakweji ipaka ine.”
(Allah) jwatite: “Jiponyani mmwe Musa!”
Ni wajiponyisye; basi ajile sai wajiweni jisyuchile lijoka lyakwenda mwaluwilo
(Allah) jwatite: “Likamulani, soni nkajogopa. Chituliuchisye mu kawe kakwe kandanda (kuwa simbo).”
“Soni kwapatisyani ligasa lyenu kungwapa kwenu; chilikopoche lili lyeswela (lyakumelemenda) ngawaga mwaulwele, (chele nikuwa) chisimosimo chine.”
“Kuti tunnosye ine mu isimosimo Yetu yekulungwakulungwa.”
“Jaawulani kwa Firiauna, chisimu jwalakwejo jusumbile mpika (pakulikwesya).”
